TopicTitle: Is there a way to remove Ore contracts?

Articles.Content:
Well it's no secret I think the ore stuff in the game sucks and I refuse to use it. Is there a way to stop every single contract I get from having some Ore requirement? It's pretty much ruining my game, I have to delete 20 contracts to find one that doesn't require something to do with ore and it ends up being one that wouldn't be profitable.

I agree so here's one way of fixing it:

Go to GameData/Squad/Contracts/Contracts.cfg

Find this part: 

    ISRU    {        MaximumExistent = 2

 and set MaximumExistent to 0.

Based on what TS is saying I guess they choose to comment out the entire ISRU bit instead, which also works. There is also a way to MM patch these things but I haven't learned to do so yet.
